channel.title: Rawr Pkz v2 || D Claws Works! | Full Ancient Warrior Armours!
channel.description:
[b][u]Rawr Pkz Thread[/u][/b] Welcome to the official thread of Rawr Pkz v2. [b][u]Attention![/u][/b] Do not post something contain flaming or blaming. Now let's get into the introduce of Rawr Pkz: [b][u]Server updates[/u][/b] Dragon Claws correct special. - HP Bar - Godswords special. - New KQ area ( the place that KQ located ) - Fully pest control point exchange - Removed anti-leech - New home at Edgeville - The old home will be replace as Shops & Portals located - Removed Pure command for players and replace it as Shops & Portals teleport - Updated quest tab ( a.k.a commands tab ) - Edited starter & new players spawn at shops - Edited KQ's drops and drops rate - Added Ice trolls' drops and more... [b][u]Screenshots[/u][/b] [img]http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/7149/12072204.png[/img] [img]http://i838.photobucket.com/albums/zz309/strikon/untitled.jpg?t=1274494574[/img] [b][u]Commands[/u][/b] [b][u]Players commands[/u][/b] ::home ::event - The place where KQ & Ice trolls located [b]More players commands on Quest Tab[/b] [b][u]Staff commands[/u][/b] ::teleto ::xtele ::xteleall ::ban ::ipban ::mute ::jail ::unjail ::npc ::Pnpc ::unpc ::staffzone - teleport you to the staff zone ::adminhq - for admin + only [b][u]Item list[/u][/b]
8002 - Dragon Claws 8043 - Anchor 8100 - Saradomin Sword
[b][u]Specials[/u][/b] [b][u]Donators Shop[/u][/b] Full Vesta Full Statius Full Morrigan Full Zuriel Full Elite and more... [b][u]Portals[/u][/b] There are two portals at shops. The left one is for donator area, the right one is some dragons and boss teleports [b]Notes:[/b] If you want to access to the donator area, make sure your character.txt's donator = is 1 [b][u]Downloads[/u][/b] [b]Server source[/b] - [url=http://uppit.com/v/C4C0EA2K]http://uppit.com/v/C4C0EA2K[/url] [b]Client[/b] - [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/362579210/EvolutionX_Client.rar]http://rapidshare.com/files/362579210/EvolutionX_Client.rar[/url] [b][u]Guess what? Its Credits time![/u][/b] Me Wireless

item.title: Rawr Pkz v2 || D Claws Works! | Full Ancient Warrior Armours!
item.dc:creator: @Vat Vat
item.description:
@Vat wrote:

Rawr Pkz Thread

Welcome to the official thread of Rawr Pkz v2.

Attention!

Do not post something contain flaming or blaming.
Now let’s get into the introduce of Rawr Pkz:

Server updates

Dragon Claws correct special.

  • HP Bar
  • Godswords special.
  • New KQ area ( the place that KQ located )
  • Fully pest control point exchange
  • Removed anti-leech
  • New home at Edgeville
  • The old home will be replace as Shops & Portals located
  • Removed Pure command for players and replace it as Shops & Portals teleport
  • Updated quest tab ( a.k.a commands tab )
  • Edited starter & new players spawn at shops
  • Edited KQ’s drops and drops rate
  • Added Ice trolls’ drops
    and more…

Screenshots

untitled.jpg?t=1274494574890×582

Commands
Players commands

::home
::event - The place where KQ & Ice trolls located
More players commands on Quest Tab

Staff commands
::teleto
::xtele
::xteleall
::ban
::ipban
::mute
::jail
::unjail
::npc
::Pnpc
::unpc
::staffzone - teleport you to the staff zone
::adminhq - for admin + only

Item list

8002 - Dragon Claws 8043 - Anchor 8100 - Saradomin Sword

Specials
Donators Shop

Full Vesta
Full Statius
Full Morrigan
Full Zuriel
Full Elite
and more…

Portals

There are two portals at shops. The left one is for donator area,
the right one is some dragons and boss teleports

Notes: If you want to access to the donator area,
make sure your character.txt’s donator = is 1

Downloads

Server source - http://uppit.com/v/C4C0EA2K
Client - http://rapidshare.com/files/362579210/EvolutionX_Client.rar

Guess what? Its Credits time!

Me
Wireless

Read full topic
item.source: Rawr Pkz v2 || D Claws Works! | Full Ancient Warrior Armours!
